com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.layers.layerOperations
Interface ClassifiableRaster

All Superinterfaces:
Classifiable
public interface ClassifiableRaster
extends Classifiable

Interface that all raster layers that can be classifiable and can have associated a legend, must implement.

See Also:
Classifiable

getShapeType

int getShapeType()

Returns the type of this shape.

All geometry types are defined in FShape, and their shape equivalent in FConstant.
